column1: #Text=Lightning Bolt Zolt says : " Wha ... what did you do to me ? "
#Text=" Mako says : " I think so , see those machines ?
#Text=If you create some cover , I can grab Bolin without anyone seeing .
#Text=" Korra says : " Is there a problem , my brother ?
